mapper.select:
SELECT M.*, NVL(CNT, 0) AS CNT FROM TBL_MENU M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MENU_PART, COUNT(MENU_PART) AS CNT FROM TBL_MENU GROUP BY MENU_PART ) T ON M.MENU_NO = T.MENU_PART
WHERE DEPTH = #{depth}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_FOOD (FOOD_NO, FOOD_NAME, PRICE, FOOD_KIND, FOOD_INFO, SELLYN, MENU_NO, MENU_PART) VALUES(FOOD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{foodName}, #{price}, '', #{foodInfo}, 'Y', #{menuNo}, #{menuPart})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_FOOD F INNER JOIN TBL_FOOD_IMG I ON F.FOOD_NO = I.FOOD_NO WHERE F.FOOD_NO = #{foodNo}
